item.title: Introduction to Spring Boot - part 3
item.description: We are going to focus on creating a REST api that will serve as a end point to our sping boot java application. Service Continuing with “introduction-to-spring-boot/part-2” for the User we are going to expose a REST endpoint to the application and we will use test to see if the application does what we want it to. Step 1 Create a Controller Class based on the spring MVC infrastructure. This will be used to expose the endpoint.
